preqs: The equivalent of Credit (or higher) in MPH5040 and MPH5041

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MPH5040, MPH5041}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {MPH5040, MPH5041} with grade of at least {STANDARD.C}

description: Confounding and effect modification, logistic regression, conditional logistic regression for matched case-control studies, linear regression, diagnostics to assess model fit, model estimation methods, Poisson regression for rates, Stata statistical software.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
